Text.Page:
We tested several plants and compounds in our attempts to cleanse this area, but all failed. I think dropwort might be the one that works.

It's a potent disinfectant. Could you collect some for me? It grows around the village.

Have {@LinkCreature:240#1101#Nevis} try it.

Ah, this is plenty of dropwort. More than enough for me to start my experiments.

Thank you!
Dropwort does sound promising. Can you fetch samples?
